select B.financial_body_pk, C.supplier_name AS financial_body_name, A.money, A.allot_money, A.sum_money, A.status, A.type, A.time, A.limit_time, A.confirm_time, A.approve_user, A.related_pk, A.comment, A.pk, A.create_user, A.update_user, A.base_pk, A.PNR, A.create_time, A.update_time, A.voucher_number, A.receiver, A.card_account, A.voucher_file, A.product_manager, A.belong_month
from air_ticket_paid_detail A LEFT JOIN supplier_employee B ON A.supplier_employee_pk = B.pk LEFT JOIN supplier C ON B.financial_body_pk = C.pk where related_pk = #{related_pk,jdbcType=CHAR}
